main event: A civilian reported seeing two large cigar-shaped objects flying at a very high altitude in Dayton, Ohio on October 20, 1947.
interesting points: The objects were observed moving rapidly and were noted to be about a city block apart., The report suggests that the objects may have been illusory phenomena caused by rapid movement and bright sunlight., The duration of the sighting and the speed of the objects were not definitively established., There were no detectable trails, sounds, or other visible effects associated with the objects., The report cautions against drawing firm conclusions without further evidence.
sighted object: two cigar-shaped objects in the sky
